name: Ancient Language
description:
Any Phase:  After making any Spell check, exhaust to add 1 success to the result.
Upkeep: This card does not refresh unless you spend all of your Focus to do so.

name: Bravery
description: Any Phase: Exhaust to re-roll a Horror check.

name: Camouflage
description:
+1 Sneak
Any Phase: Once per Sneak check, you may reroll all dice showing a result of 1.

name: Clairvoyant
description:
Any Phase: When making a check to close a gate, you may exhaust this card to reroll all dice showing a result of 1.
Upkeep: This card does not refresh unless you spend all of your Focus to do so.

name: Conceal
description: Any Phase: After making any Evade check, spend 2 Clue tokens to add 1 success to the result.  You may do this as often as you like.

name: Credit Rating
description: Any Phase: Exhaust instead of spending $2.

name: Criminal
description:
When you receive this card, gain a Sheldon Gang Membership if you do not already have one.
When you roll the die using the ability listed on the Sheldon Gang Membership card, you may reroll the result. You must use the new result.

name: Disguise
description:
Any Phase: After making any Evade check, exhaust to add 1 success to the result.
Upkeep:  This card does not refresh unless you spend all of your Focus to do so.

name: Dodge
description: When you make any Speed check, add +1 to each die you roll for purposes of checking for successes (i.e., a roll of 3 becomes a 4, etc.)

name: Egyptologist
description:
When you receive this card, draw an Exhibit Item.
Gain a +1 on all skill checks when resolving an Exhibit Encounter card. (This only applies to checks that are printed on an Exhibit Encounter card.

name: Endurance
description:
Any Phase: After making any Combat check, exhaust to add 1 success to the result.
Upkeep: This card does not refresh unless you spend all of your Focus to do so.

name: Expert Occultist
description: Any Phase: Exhaust to re-roll a Spell check.

name: Fight (skill)
description:
+1 Fight
When you spend a Clue token to add to any Fight check, add one extra bonus die.

name: Fisticuffs
description: Any Phase: After making any Combat check, spend 2 Clue tokens to add 1 success to the result.  You may do this as often as you like.

name: Grapple
description: When you make any Fight check, add +1 to each die you roll for the purposes of checking for successes (i.e., a roll of 3 becomes a 4, etc.).

name: Hide
description: When you make any Sneak check, add +1 to each die you roll for the purposes of checking for successes (i.e., a roll of 3 becomes a 4, etc).

name: Informant
description: During the Upkeep Phase, if you are in Innsmouth and both of the spaces on the Feds Raid Innsmouth track that are the same color as the neighborhood you're in are empty, you may spend 1 Clue token to place Clue tokens on both of those spaces.

name: Initiate
description:
When you receive this card, draw an "One of the Thousand" Cult Membership if you do not already have one.
When you draw a Cult Encounter card, draw an additional Cult Encounter card, choose one to resolve and then discard the other.

name: Library Use
description: When you make any Lore check, add +1 to each die you roll for the purposes of checking for successes (i.e., a roll of 3 becomes a 4, etc.).

name: Linguistics
description:
+1 Lore
Any Phase: Once per Lore check, you may reroll all dice showing a result of 1.

name: Listen
description:
+1 Luck
Any Phase: Once per Luck check, you may reroll all dice showing a result of 1.

name: Lore (skill)
description:
+1 Lore
When you spend a Clue token to add to any Lore check, add one extra bonus die.

name: Luck (skill)
description:
+1 Luck
When you spend a Clue token to add to any Luck check, add one extra bonus die.

name: Marksman
description: Any Phase: Exhaust to re-roll a Combat check.

name: Martial Arts
description: Any Phase: When you make any Combat check, gain +2 for every empty hand you have.

name: Mental Fortitude
description:
Any Phase: After making any Horror check, exhaust to add 1 success to the result.
Upkeep:  This card does not refresh unless you spend all of your Focus to do so.

name: Mystic Gift
description: Any Phase: After making any Spell check, spend 2 Clue tokens to add 1 success to the result.  You may do this as often as you like.

name: Mythos Lore
description:
-1 Maximum Sanity
Any Phase:  Exhaust instead of spending 1 Clue token.

name: Painter
description: If you are in the Artists' Colony location during the Arkham Encounters Phase, instead of having an encounter there, you may exhaust this card to create a painting. Roll a die and consult the chart below to discover the result of your art.

name: Performer
description:
If the Act I card is in play, you may exhaust this card to gain a +1 on any skill check.
or
If the Act II card is in play, you may exhaust this card to gain a +2 on any skill check.

name: Persuade
description:
+1 Will
Any Phase: Once per Will check, you may reroll all dice showing a result of 1.

name: Psychology
description: When you make any Will check, add +1 to each die you roll for purposes of checking for successes (i.e., a roll of 3 become a 4, etc.).

name: Run
description:
+1 Speed
Any Phase: Once per Speed check, you may reroll all dice showing a result of 1.

name: Sneak (skill)
description:
+1 Sneak
When you spend a Clue token to add to any Sneak check, add one extra bonus die.

name: Speed (skill)
description:
+1 Speed
When you spend a Clue token to add to any Speed check, add one extra bonus die.

name: Spot Hidden
description: When you make any Luck check, add +1 to each die you roll for purposes of checking for successes (i.e., a roll of 3 becomes a 4, etc.).

name: Stealth
description: Any Phase: Exhaust to re-roll an Evade check.

name: Strong Will
description: Any Phase:  After making any Horror check, spend 2 Clue tokens to add 1 success to the result.  You may do this as often as you like.

name: Will (skill)
description:
+1 Will
When you spend a Clue token to add to any Will check, add one extra bonus die.

name: Wrestle
description:
+1 Fight
Any Phase: Once per Fight check, you may reroll all dice showing a result of 1.
